summary: In this refashion of the 1582 "Honno-ji Incident", two rival groups resort to all sorts of nonsense as they attempt to appoint a new daimyo.
cast: Kôji Yakusho|Yô Ôizumi|Fumiyo Kohinata|Kôichi Satô|Satoshi Tsumabuki|Tadanobu Asano|Susumu Terajima|Ken'ichi Matsuyama|Yûsuke Iseya|Kyôka Suzuki|Miki Nakatani|Ayame Gôriki|Keiko Toda|Toshiyuki Nishida|Denden|Yûki Amami|Kenji Anan|Kazuyuki Asano|Minosuke Bandô|Shinpei Ichikawa|Zen Kajihara|Yoshimasa Kondô|Kankurô Nakamura|Catherine Seto|Eisuke Shinoi|Shôta Sometani
title: Kiyosu kaigi
